thread.title: Tabitha Vaughn
thread.title_full: Avas Flowers reviewed by Tabitha Vaughn

author: Tabitha Vaughn
title: Tabitha Vaughn
text: I am not going to get into all what this "company" did, however, I will say this is a SCAM!!! Order from your local florist. I never got the flowers that were ordered for me and 18 separate phone calls to customer service didn't help the situation either. They are a joke and need to be shut down. Awful customer service and overall just an awful "company."
